thumb.title: the last wish of a dead girl / ft. 宮舞モカ
thumb.description: from album「ROSE OF SHARON」bandcamp: https://leshymusic.bandcamp.com/album/rose-of-sharon■ 作詞・作曲：Leshy-P ( https://x.com/leshy_music )■ vocal：宮舞モカ, ジン (Jin)歌詞:That's my fate! Into the darkness you found me dieIn my room behind the door I criedMy fears and my belly full of crimeKnife in my hands are you thereGimme that nightmareCelum vel InfernumI know it is my doomThe last wish of dead girlCarry my urn to my homeland skyPlease don't save dead girlLet me go away, you said 'she’s dead'The last wish of dead girlKiss my forehead before worms eat mePlease don't save dead girlLet me go away, you know I’m deadNo one cried but in sportcar you found me cryI was in your mind like piece of artWith knife in my hands, into my heartYou know I did not screamWash it, clean it, born in sinThe last wish of dead girlI carried your urn and kissed foreheadI tried to save dead girlBut she left away, I said 'she's dead'The last wish of dead girlPlease love me till you will be deadPlease don't save dead girlI died but I see that no one cares

tags.tag: 宮舞モカオリジナル曲
